sqlMap.select: SELECT OG.YEAR, OG.OFFICE_EVAL_GRP_ID, OG.OFFICE_EVAL_GRP_NM , COUNT(O.OFFICE_ID) AS OFFICE_CNT , OG.SORT_ORDER FROM GOV_OFFICE_GRP OG LEFT OUTER JOIN GOV_OFFICE O ON OG.YEAR = O.YEAR AND OG.OFFICE_EVAL_GRP_ID = O.OFFICE_EVAL_GRP_ID WHERE 1=1 AND OG.YEAR = #findYear# GROUP BY OG.YEAR, OG.OFFICE_EVAL_GRP_ID, OG.OFFICE_EVAL_GRP_NM, OG.SORT_ORDER ORDER BY OG.SORT_ORDER NULLS LAST, OG.OFFICE_EVAL_GRP_ID
SELECT YEAR , OFFICE_EVAL_GRP_ID , OFFICE_EVAL_GRP_NM , SORT_ORDER , COMMENTS FROM GOV_OFFICE_GRP WHERE 1 = 1 AND YEAR = #year# AND OFFICE_EVAL_GRP_ID = #officeEvalGrpId#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT F_PGM_SERI('GOV_OFFICE_GRP',#year#,'','','','') SEQ FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO GOV_OFFICE_GRP ( YEAR , OFFICE_EVAL_GRP_ID , OFFICE_EVAL_GRP_NM , SORT_ORDER , COMMENTS , CREATE_DT ) VALUES ( #year# , #SEQ# , #officeEvalGrpNm# , #sortOrder# , #comments# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE GOV_OFFICE_GRP SET OFFICE_EVAL_GRP_NM = #officeEvalGrpNm# , SORT_ORDER = #sortOrder# , COMMENTS = #comments# WHERE 1 = 1 AND YEAR = #year# AND OFFICE_EVAL_GRP_ID = #officeEvalGrpId#
DELETE FROM GOV_OFFICE_GRP WHERE 1 = 1 AND YEAR = #year# AND OFFICE_EVAL_GRP_ID = #officeEvalGrpId#
